metadata.title: CVE-2024-49214 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: QUIC in HAProxy 3.1.x before 3.1-dev7, 3.0.x before 3.0.5, and 2.9.x before2.9.11 allows opening a 0-RTT session with a spoofed IP address. This canbypass the IP allow/block list functionality.

criterions.comment: haproxy package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
